description: This catalog contains the 'Pôle de données et services Surfaces Planétaires' (PDSP) hosted planetary data. This catalog is organized by french scientific laboratory. Within each sub-catalog, users will find data organized by solar body.

A special ODE field that indicates whether this footprint overlaps specific targets (Example: Spirit Rover)
